channel.title: Research on Matt Galloway, University of Minnesota
channel.description: Recent content in Research on Matt Galloway, University of Minnesota

item.title: Research
item.description: My research interests include statistical machine learning, multivariate analysis, precision matrix estimation, sufficient dimension reduction, and kernel methods (among others). R Packages ADMMsigma Estimates a penalized precision matrix via the alternating direction method of multipliers (ADMM) algorithm. Omega Estimates a penalized precision matrix via various estimation methods. OMEGA combines ADMMsigma and GLASSOO (along with other estimation methods) into a complete package. GLASSOO Estimates a penalized precision matrix via block-wise coordinate descent â€“ also known as the graphical lasso (glasso) algorithm.
